**9.3**
1.

```{r}
diamonds%>% 
  group_by(color)%>%
  summarise(Max = mean(carat))%>%
  arrange(desc(Max))%>%
  head(1)
```


2.
```{r}
diamonds%>%
  group_by(clarity)%>%
  summarise(averagesize = mean(table/carat))%>%
  arrange(desc(averagesize))%>%
  head(1)
```
